segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I see the warm light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a dish, her back to the unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the sink overflowing—water everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over in a sheet, forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clueless, one shoe already wet from it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cabinet door hangs open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on a two-step stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the stool's tipping back— he's about to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands ready, palm up for a cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so calm, bushes neatly lined along the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a recipe for accident with water and instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in this domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful view and the chaos is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids might get away with their treat, or not.
segments.speaker: PAR
